channel.title: Most imberising moments
channel.description:
hey ppl post your most imberasing moments you ever had well heres mine
well i was in the shower and it was my bday so all the ppl attending the bday went near my bathroom door and when i come out they shouted happy bday and half my towel fell of....lol

item.title: Most imberising moments
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:7, topic:74579”]Yeah well I don’t have it so bad. Areata is the strain where it is only in patches. I am able to cover it easy.

Medication was a bitch. Once every two weeks I used to get about 75-100 needles into my head. Now we have this very acidic solution which works well. Seems like now I just deal with a little patch once every year or less, and it isn’t so bad.

Also they never were able to find the cause. I’ve had it since I was born.[/quote]
My friend (Firion on io9Labs) had something like that once, only it was 1 patch and they fixed it with some surgery (folded over hair)

Read full topic

item.title: Most imberising moments
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Yeah well I don’t have it so bad. Areata is the strain where it is only in patches. I am able to cover it easy.

Medication was a bitch. Once every two weeks I used to get about 75-100 needles into my head. Now we have this very acidic solution which works well. Seems like now I just deal with a little patch once every year or less, and it isn’t so bad.

Also they never were able to find the cause. I’ve had it since I was born.

Read full topic

item.title: Most imberising moments
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

jme_009:

I lived an embarassing 16 years fighting my Alopecia Areata.

Oooh, that’s gotta suck.

For those who don’t, Alopecia Areata (pronounced are-oh-PEE-shee-ah ah-REE-aht-ah) is when your body mistakes your hair for foreign bodies (e.g., viruses and bacteria)

Read full topic
